book: The Ungovernable Economy: How Billionaire AI Could Break Global Finance

chapters.name: The New Gilded Age
topics: How does current wealth concentration compare to any period in history?

topics: Could billionaires coordinate asset movements without explicit communication?

How do complex systems fail in ways individual components don't predict?

Could an AI 'discover' a profitable strategy that destroys the market it trades in?
